name: CreateGithubOrgVariable
description:
Create an organization variable for GitHub Actions workflows.

Creates an organization variable in GitHub that can be referenced in Actions workflows. Requires an access token with `admin:org` scope or `organization_actions_variables:write` permission for GitHub Apps.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: variable_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization variable to be created. This name will be used to reference the variable in workflows.

parameters.name: variable_value
parameters.description: The value assigned to the organization variable in GitHub.

parameters.name: repository_access_visibility
parameters.description: Type of repositories in the organization that can access the variable: 'all', 'private', or 'selected'.

value_schema.description: The type of repositories in the organization that can access the variable. `selected` means only the repositories specified by `selected_repository_ids` can access the variable.

parameters.name: repository_ids_with_variable_access
parameters.description: List of repository IDs allowed to access the organization variable. Required when 'visibility' is 'selected'.

value_schema.description: An array of repository ids that can access the organization variable. You can only provide a list of repository ids when the `visibility` is set to `selected`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: selected_repository_ids
parameters.description: An array of repository ids that can access the organization variable. You can only provide a list of repository ids when the `visibility` is set to `selected`.

value_schema.description: An array of repository ids that can access the organization variable. You can only provide a list of repository ids when the `visibility` is set to `selected`.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The type of repositories in the organization that can access the variable. `selected` means only the repositories specified by `selected_repository_ids` can access the variable.

value_schema.description: The type of repositories in the organization that can access the variable. `selected` means only the repositories specified by `selected_repository_ids` can access the variable.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
